description: Transitioning from legacy Local Administrator Password Solution (LAPS) to modern Windows LAPS is highly recommended for enhanced management and security of administrative passwords. Current documentation for the ADMX files has issues that are expected to be resolved in future updates. Migrating to modern Windows LAPS allows for improved integration with newer Windows features and security enhancements. Keeping abreast of documentation changes ensures optimal configuration and implementation of the product. Organizations should stay updated on this migration path to maintain security best practices.
